GE07bhg4c09u:333: madhusūdanaḥ - asaṃśliṣṭayor apy ādhārādheya-bhāvaṃ dṛṣṭāntenāha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c09u:339: 'pi na na kadāpy ākāśena saha saṃsṛjyate |
GE07bhg4c09u:340: tathaivāsaṅga-svabhāve mayi saṃśleṣam antareṇaiva sarvāṇi bhūtāny ākāśādīni mahānti sarvatragāni
GE07bhg4c09u:342: viśvanāthaḥ --- asaṅge mayi bhūtāni sthitāny api na sthitāni, teṣv apy ahaṃ sthito 'pi na sthita ity atra dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c09u:343: yathaivāsaṅga-svabhāve ākāśe nityaṃ vātīti vāyuḥ sarvadā calana-svabhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:344: | ataeva sarvatra gacchatīti sarvatra-go mahān parimāṇataḥ yathā
GE07bhg4c09u:345: svākāśasya asaṅgatvāt tatra sthito 'pi na sthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:346: ākāśo 'pi vāyau sthito 'pi na sthito 'saṅgatvād eva tathaivāsaṅga-svabhāve mayi sarvāṇi
GE07bhg4c09u:347: ākāśādīni mahānti sarvatragāni sthitāni nāpi sthitānīty upadhāraya vimṛśya niścinu |
GE07bhg4c09u:348: nanu tarhi paśya me yogam aiśvaram iti bhagavad-uktaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:353: jagad-adhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhātṛtve parameśvaraṃ vinā nānyatrāstīty atarkyatvaṃ siddham eva |
GE07bhg4c09u:354: tad apy ākāśa-dṛṣṭānto loka-buddhi-praveśārtha eva jñeyaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c09u:355: baladevaḥ - carācarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mat-saṅkalpāyattā sthitir vṛttiś cety atra dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c09u:356: yathā nirālambe mahaty ākāśe nirālambo mahān vāyuḥ sthitaḥ sarvatra gacchati |
GE07bhg4c09u:357: tasya tasya ca nirālambatayā sthitir mat-saṅkalpād eva pravṛttiś cety antaryāmi-brāhmaṇāt yad bhīṣā vātaḥ pavate iti śruty-antarāc copadhārayeti, tathā sarvāṇi sthira-carāṇi
GE07bhg4c09u:358: bhūtāni mat-sthāni tair ansaṃtuṣṭe mayi sthitāni mayaiva saṅkalpa-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c09u:363: kalpa-kṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham ||7||
GE07bhg4c09u:364: śrīdharaḥ - tad evam asaṅgasyaiva yogamāyayā sthiti-hetutvam uktam |
GE07bhg4c09u:369: punaḥ kalpādau sṛṣṭi-kāle tāni visṛjāmi viśeṣeṇa sṛjāmi ||7||
GE07bhg4c09u:370: madhusūdanaḥ - evam utpatti-kāle sthiti-kāle ca kalpitena prapañcenāsaṅgasyātmano 'saṃśleṣam uktvā pralaye 'pi tam āha sarvetei |
GE07bhg4c09u:371: sarvāṇi bhūtāni kalpa-kṣaye pralaya-kāle māmikāṃ mac-chaktitvena kalpitāṃ prakṛtiṃ triguṇātmikāṃ māyāṃ sva-kāraṇa-bhūtāṃ yānti tatraiva sūkṣma-rūpeṇa līyanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:373: punas tāni kalpādau sarga-kāle visṛjāmi prakṛtāv avibhāgāpannāni vyanajmi ahaṃ sarvajñaḥ sarva-śaktir īśvaraḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c09u:374: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanv adhunā dṛśyamāny etāni bhūtāni tvayi sthitānīty avagamyate |
GE07bhg4c09u:375: mahā-pralaye kva yāsyantīty apekṣāyām āha sarveti |
GE07bhg4c09u:376: māmikāṃ madīyāṃ mama triguṇātmikāyāṃ māyā-śaktau līyanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:378: kalpa-kṣaye pralayānte sṛṣṭi-kāle tāni viśeṣeṇa sṛjāmi ||7||
GE07bhg4c09u:379: baladevaḥ - sva-saṅkalpād eva bhūtānāṃ sthitir uktā |
GE07bhg4c09u:380: atha tasmād eva teṣāṃ sarga-pralayāv āha sarveti |
GE07bhg4c09u:382: caturmukhāvasāna-kāle sarvāṇi bhūtāni mat-saṅkalpād eva māmikāṃ prakṛtiṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:384: prakṛti-śaktike mayi vilīyante kalpādau punas tāny aham eva bahu syām iti saṅkalpa-mātreṇa vaividhyena sṛjāmi ||7||
GE07bhg4c09u:386: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:387: bhūta-grāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt ||8||
GE07bhg4c09u:388: śrīdharaḥ - nanv asaṅgo nirvikāraś ca tvaṃ kathaṃ sṛjasīty apekṣāyām āha -
GE07bhg4c09u:391: pralaye līnaṃ santaṃ caturvidham imaṃ sarvaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:395: madhusūdanaḥ - kiṃ-nimittā parameśvara-stheyaṃ sṛṣṭir na tāvat
GE07bhg4c09u:396: sva-bhogārthā tasya sarva-sākṣi-bhūta-caitanya-mātrasya bhoktṛtvābhāvāt tathātve vā saṃsāritveneśvaratva-vyāghātāt
GE07bhg4c09u:397: nāpy anyo bhoktā yad artheyaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:403_0: apavarga-virodhitvāc cety ādy-anupapattiḥ sṛṣṭer māyā-mayatvaṃ sādhayantī nāsmākaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:403_1: pratikūleti na parihartavyety abhipretya māyāmayatvān mithyātvaṃ prapañcasya vaktum
GE07bhg4c09u:404: prakṛtiṃ māyākhyām anirvacanīyāṃ svāṃ svasmin kalpitām avaṣṭabhya
GE07bhg4c09u:405: svasattā-sphūrtibhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya tasyāḥ prakṛter māyāyā vaśād avidyāsmitā-rāga-dveṣābhiniveśa-kāraṇāvaraṇa-vikṣepātmaka-śakti-prabhāvāj
GE07bhg4c09u:407: ākāśādi-bhūta-samudāyam ahaṃ māyāvīva punaḥ punar visṛjāmi vividhaṃ sṛjāmi
GE07bhg4c09u:409: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanv asaṅgo nirvikāraś ca tvaṃ kathaṃ sṛjasīty apekṣāyām āha - prakṛtim iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:410: svāṃ svīyām avaṣṭabhyādhiṣṭhāya prakṛter vaśāt svīya-svabhāva-vaśāt prācīna-karma-nimittād iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c09u:414: svām ātmīyāṃ tri-guṇāṃ prakṛtim avaṣṭabhyādhiṣṭhāya saṅkalpa-mātreṇa mahad-ādyān manā pariṇamayyemaṃ caturvidham bhūta-grāmaṃ visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ kāle kāle |
GE07bhg4c09u:415: kīdṛśam ity āha prakṛteḥ prācīna-karma-vāsanāyā vaśāt prabhāvād avaśaṃ paratantraṃ tathā cācintya-śakter asaṅga-svabhāvasya mama saṅkalpa-mātreṇa tat tat kurvato
GE07bhg4c09u:416: na tat-saṃsarga-gandho na ca ko 'pi kheda-leśa iti ||8||
GE07bhg4c09u:418: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya |
GE07bhg4c09u:420: śrīdharaḥ - nanv evaṃ nānā-vidhāni karmāṇi kurvatas tava jīvavad-bandhaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:421: kathaṃ na syād iti ? ata āha na ca mām iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:426: ata udāsīnatvānupapatter udāsīnavat sthitam ity uktam ||9||
GE07bhg4c09u:428: na ca naiva sṛṣṭi-sthiti-pralayākhyāni tāni māyāvineva svapna-dṛśeva ca mayā kriyamāṇāni māṃ nibandhnanti anugraha-nigrahābhyāṃ na sukṛta-duṣkṛta-bhāginaṃ kurvanti mithyā-bhūtatvāt
GE07bhg4c09u:429: | he dhanañjaya yudhiṣṭhira-rājasūyārthaṃ sarvān rājño jitvā dhanam āhṛtavān iti mahān prabhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ protsāhanārtham |
GE07bhg4c09u:430: tāni karmāṇi kuto na badhnanti tatrāha udāsīnavad āsīnam |
GE07bhg4c09u:431: yathā kaścid upekṣako dvayor vivadamānayor jaya-parājayāsaṃsargī
GE07bhg4c09u:432: tat-kṛta-harṣa-viṣādābhyām asaṃsṛṣṭo nirvikāra āste tadvan nirvikāratayāsīnam |
GE07bhg4c09u:436: sṛṣṭy-ādi-karmasv asaktam ahaṃ karomīty abhimāna-lakṣeṇa saṅgena rahitaṃ māṃ na nibadnanti karmāṇīti yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c09u:438: phala-saṅgābhāve ca karmāṇi na bandha-kāraṇānīty uktam anena |
GE07bhg4c09u:439: tad-ubhaya-sattve tu kośa-kāra iva karmabhir badhyate mūḍha ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:440: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanv evaṃ ca nānā-karmāṇi kurvatas tava jīvavad-bandhaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:441: kathaṃ na syād ? ata āha na ceti |
GE07bhg4c09u:443: karmāsaktir hi baddha-hetuḥ sā cāpta-kāmatvān mama nāsti |
GE07bhg4c09u:445: anya udāsīno yathā vivadamānānāṃ duḥkha-śokādi-saṃsṛṣṭo na bhavati tathaivāham ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:446: baladevaḥ -- nanu viṣamāṇi sṛṣṭi-poālana-lakṣaṇāni vaiṣamyādinā tvāṃ badhnīyur iti cet tatrāha na ceti |
GE07bhg4c09u:447: tāni viṣama-sṛṣṭy-ādīni karmāṇi na mayi vaiṣamyādi-prasañjayanti |
GE07bhg4c09u:449: jīvānāṃ deva-mānava-tiryag-ādi-bhāve tat-tad-abhyudaya-tāratamye ca teṣāṃ pūrvārjitāni karmāṇy eva kāraṇāni |
GE07bhg4c09u:450: ahaṃ tu teṣu viṣameṣu karmasv audāīnyena sthito 'sakta iti na mayi vaiṣamyādi-doṣa-gandhaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:451: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye na [Vs. 2.1.35] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c09u:452: udāsīnatve kartṛtvaṃ na siddhyed ata uktam udāsīnavad iti ||9||
GE07bhg4c09u:458: nimitta-bhūtena prakṛtiḥ sa-carācaraṃ viśvaṃ sūyate janayati |
GE07bhg4c09u:460: mad-adhiṣṭhānena hetunedaṃ jagad viparivartate punaḥ punar jāyate |
GE07bhg4c09u:461: sannidhi-mātreṇādhiṣṭhātṛtvāt kartṛtvam udāsīnatvaṃ cāviruddham iti bhāvaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c09u:462: madhusūdanaḥ - bhūta-grāmam imaṃ visṛjāmy udāsīnavad āsīnam iti ca
GE07bhg4c09u:463: paraspara-viruddham iti śaṅkā-parihārārthaṃ punar māyāmayatvam eva
GE07bhg4c09u:466: niyantrā bhāsakenāvabhāsitā prakṛtis triguṇātmikā sattvāsattvādibhir anirvācyā māyā sūyata utpādayati sa-carācaraṃ jagan māyāvinādhiṣṭhiteva māyā kalpita-gaja-turagādikam |
GE07bhg4c09u:467: na tv ahaṃ sva-kārya-māyābhāsanam antareṇa karomi vyāpārāntaram |
GE07bhg4c09u:469: jagat sa-carācaraṃ viparivartate vividhaṃ parivartate janmādi-vināśāntaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:470: dity-āder iva kartṛtvābhāvād udāsīnavad āsīnam ity uktam iti na virodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:473: ajñānaṃ tad upāśritya brahma kāraṇam ucyate || iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:475: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartus tavedam audāsīnyaṃ na pratyemīty ata āha mayeti |
GE07bhg4c09u:476: adhyakṣeṇa mayā nimitta-bhūtena prakṛtiḥ sa-carācaraṃ jagat sūyate |
GE07bhg4c09u:479: yathā kasyacid ambarīṣāder iva bhūpateḥ prakṛtibhir eva rājya-kṛtyaṃ nirvāhyate
GE07bhg4c09u:480: | atrodāsīnasya bhūpateḥ sattā-mātram iti yathā tasya rāja-siṃhāsane
GE07bhg4c09u:481: sattā-mātreṇa vinā prakṛtibhiḥ kim api na śakyate kartum |
GE07bhg4c09u:483: mamādhiṣṭhāna-lakṣaṇam adhyakṣatvaṃ vinā prakṛtir api jaḍā kim api kartuṃ na śaknotīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:488: mayā sarveśvareṇa jīva-pūrva-pūrva-karmānuguṇatayā vīkṣitā prakṛtiḥ sa-carācaraṃ jagat sūyate janayati |
GE07bhg4c09u:489: viṣama-guṇā satī anena jīva-pūrva-karmānuguṇena mad-vīkṣaṇena hetunā taj jagad viparivartate punaḥ punar udbhavati |
GE07bhg4c09u:495: iti sannidhi-mātreṇādhiṣṭhātṛtvāt kartṛtvam udāsaniṃ ca na viruddham |
GE07bhg4c09u:496: yathā sannidhi-mātreṇagandhaḥ kṣobhāya jāyate ity ādi smaraṇāc caitad evaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:498: mad-vinā kim api kartuṃ na sā prabhavet na hy asati rājñaḥ siṃhāsanādhiṣṭhātṛtve tad-amātyāḥ kārye prabhavaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c09u:500: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam |
GE07bhg4c09u:502: śrīdharaḥ - nanv evaṃbhūtaṃ parameśvaraṃ tvāṃ kim iti kecin nādriyante ?
GE07bhg4c09u:504: sarva-bhūta-maheśvara-rūpaṃ madīyaṃ paraṃ bhāvaṃ tattvam ajānanto mūḍhā mūrkhā mām avajānanti mām avamanyante |
GE07bhg4c09u:505: avajñāne hetuḥ śuddha-sattva-mayīm api tanuṃ bhaktecchā-vaśān manuṣyākārām āśritavantam iti
GE07bhg4c09u:507: ātmānam ānanda-ghanam anantam api santam avajānantīti |
GE07bhg4c09u:508: avajānanti māṃ sākṣād īśvaro 'yam iti nādriyante nindanti vā mūḍhā avivekino janāḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:509: teṣām avajñā-hetuṃ bhramaṃ sūcayati mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritaṃ manuṣyatayā
GE07bhg4c09u:510: pratīyamānāṃ mūrtim ātmecchayā bhaktānugrahārthaṃ gṛhītavantaṃ manuṣyatayā pratīyamānena dehena vyavaharantam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c09u:511: tataś ca manuṣyo 'yam iti bhrāntyācchāditāntaḥkaraṇā mama paraṃ bhāvaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ paāramarthikaṃ tattvaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ mahāntarm īśvaram ajānanto yan nādriyante nindanti
GE07bhg4c09u:514: saccid-ānanda-vigrahaḥ kāraṇārṇava-śāyī mahā-puruṣaḥ sva-prakṛtyā jagat sṛjatīti yaḥ prasiddhaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:516: kintu vasudeva-sūnos taveyaṃ mānuṣī tanur ity etad-aṃśenaiva kecit tava nikarṣaṃ vadantīty ata āha
GE07bhg4c09u:518: mama mānuṣyās tanor asyā paraṃ bhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:519: kāraṇārṇava-śāyi-mahā-puruṣādibhyo 'py utkṛṣṭaṃ svarūpam ajānanta eva te |
GE07bhg4c09u:520: kīdṛśam ? bhūtaṃ satyaṃ yad brahma tac ca tan maheśvaraṃ ceti |
GE07bhg4c09u:522: maheśvara-padaṃ satyāntara-vyāvartakam atra jñeyam yukte kṣmādāvṛte bhūtam iti amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:524: vṛndāvana-sura-bhūruha-bhāvanāsīnaṃ satataṃ sa-marud-gaṇo 'haṃ paramayā stutyā toṣayāmi iti (GTU 1.33) śruteḥ |[*ENDNOTE]
GE07bhg4c09u:526: mamāsyā mānuṣyās tanoḥ saccid-ānanda-mayatvaṃ mad-abhijṇa-bhaktair ucyata
GE07bhg4c09u:527: eva, tathā sarva-brahmāṇḍa-vyāpitvaṃ ca bālye yan-mātrā śrī-yaśodayā
GE07bhg4c09u:529: yad vā mānuṣīṃ tanum eva viśinaṣṭi param utkṛṣṭaṃ bhāvaṃ sattāṃ viśuddhaṃ sattvaṃ saccidānanda-svarūpam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:531: paraṃ bhāvam api viśinaṣṭi mama bhūta-maheśvaraṃ mama sṛjyāni bhūtāni ye brahmādyās teṣām api mahāntam īśvaram |
GE07bhg4c09u:532: tasmāt jīvasyeva mama parameśvarasya tanur na bhinnā |
GE07bhg4c09u:534: aham eva tanuḥ sākṣād brahmaiva śābdaṃ brahma dadhad vapuḥ [BhP
GE07bhg4c09u:535: 3.21.8] iti mad-abhijña-śukokter iti bhavādṛśais tu viśvasyatām iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:536: baladevaḥ - nanv īdṛśa-mahimānaṃ tvāṃ kim iti kecin nādriyante ? tatrāha avajānantīti |
GE07bhg4c09u:538: sarvajñaṃ mahā-kāruṇikaṃ ca māṃ mūḍhās te 'vajānanti |
GE07bhg4c09u:539: atra prakāraṃ darśayan viśinaṣṭi mānuṣīm iti mānuṣa-sanniveśinīṃ mānuṣa-ceṣṭā-bahulāṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:540: tanuṃ śrī-mūrtim āśritaṃ tādātmya-sambandhena nityaṃ prāptaṃ mām
GE07bhg4c09u:541: itara-rāja-kumāra-tulyaḥ kaścid ugra-puṇyo manuṣyo 'yam iti buddhyāvamanyanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:542: mānuṣī tanuḥ khalu pāñcabhautikyena na ca
GE07bhg4c09u:543: bhagavat-tanus tādṛk sac-cid-ānanda-rūpāya kṛṣṇāya iti, tam ekaṃ govindaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:547: evaṃ buddhis teṣāṃ kuto yayā te mūḍhā bhaṇyante ? tatrāha param iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:548: param asādhāraṇaṃ bhāvaṃ svabhāvam ajānantaḥ mānuṣākṛtes tasya
GE07bhg4c09u:550: evaṃ ca sati tanum āśritam ity ukti-viśeṣa-vibhātaṃ bheda-kāryam ādāya bodhyā |
GE07bhg4c09u:551_0: yat tu vasudeva-sūnor dvārakādhipateḥ sūtikā-gṛhāvirbhūtam eva svarūpaṃ naijaṃ caturbhujatvāt
GE07bhg4c09u:551_1: tato vrajaṃ gacchataḥ svarūpaṃ tu mānuṣaṃ dvibhujatvād ata uktam babhūva prākṛtaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:552: tan-niravadhānam mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam iti tad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:553: tenaiva rūpeṇa catur-bhujena iti pārtha-vākyāc ca tasmān mānuṣya-saṃniveśitvam eva
GE07bhg4c09u:554: tat-tanor manuṣyatvam ity uktam yatrāvatīrṇaṃ kṛṣṇākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma narākṛti iti śrī-vaiṣṇave
GE07bhg4c09u:558: yathā manuṣyo 'pi rājā devavat siṃhavac ca viceṣṭanān nṛ-devo nṛ-siṃhaś ca vyapadiśyate |

GE07bhg4c09u:1508: tāvatā na darpaṇe rajyati na vā dveṣṭi ghaṭam |
GE07bhg4c09u:1515: viśvanātha - nanu bhaktān eva vimuktīkṛtya svaṃ prāpayasi |
GE07bhg4c09u:1516: na tv abhaktān iti cet tarhi tavāpi kiṃ rāga-dveṣādi-kṛtaṃ vaiṣamyam asti ? nety āha samo
GE07bhg4c09u:1518: te bhaktā mayi vartante 'ham api teṣu varta iti vyākhyāne bhagavaty eva sarva-jagad vartata eva |
GE07bhg4c09u:1519: bhagavān api sarva-jagatsu vartata eveti nāsti viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1520: tasmāt ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham [Gītā 4.11] iti nyāyena |
GE07bhg4c09u:1521: mayi te āsaktā bhaktā vartante yathā tathāhamapi teṣv āsakta iti vyākhyeyam |
GE07bhg4c09u:1524: na hi kalpa-vṛkṣa-phalākāṅkṣayā tad āśritā āsajjanti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1529: yad uktaṃ prahrādāya yadā druhyed dhaniṣye 'pi varorjitam [BhP 7.4.28] iti kecit tu tu-kārasya
GE07bhg4c09u:1530: bhinnopakramārthatvam ākhyāya bhakta-vātsalya-lakṣaṇaṃ tu vaiṣamyaṃ mayi
GE07bhg4c09u:1531: vidyata eveti tac ca bhagavato bhūṣaṇaṃ, na tu dūṣaṇam iti vyācakṣate |
GE07bhg4c09u:1532: tathā hi bhagavato bhakta-vātsalyam eva prasiddham |
GE07bhg4c09u:1534: yogi-vātsalyaṃ vā, yathā hy anyo janaḥ sva-dāseṣv eva vatsalo nānya-dāseṣu, tathaiva bhagavān api sva-bhakteṣv eva vatsalo na
GE07bhg4c09u:1536: baladevaḥ -- nanu bhaktān eva vimocyāntikaṃ nayasi |
GE07bhg4c09u:1537: nābhaktān iti tavāpi kiṃ sarveśvarasya rāga-dveṣa-kṛtaṃ vaiṣamyam asti ? tatrāha samo 'ham
GE07bhg4c09u:1538: | deva-manuṣya-tiryak-sthāvarādiṣu jātyākṛti-svabhāvair viṣameṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu tat-tat-karmānuguṇyena sṛṣṭi-pālana-kṛt sarveśvaro 'haṃsamaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:1539: parjanya iva nānā-vidheṣu tat-tad-bījeṣu, na teṣu me ko 'pi dveṣyaḥ priyo vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1540: bhaktānām abhaktebhyo viśesaṃ bodhayitum iha tu-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1541: ye tu māṃ bhajanti śravaṇādi-bhaktibhir anukūlayanti, te bhaktyānuraktyā mayi
GE07bhg4c09u:1543: teṣv ahaṃ ca sarveśvaro 'pi bhaktyā varte, maṇi-suvarṇa-nyāyena
GE07bhg4c09u:1545: bahgavān bhakta-bhaktimān ity ādi śrī-śuka-vākyād iti premṇā mitho vartana-viśeṣo darśitaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:1547: tasya pratijñā tv īdṛśy evāvagamyate ye yathā mām ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c09u:1552: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ upapadyate cābhyupalabhyate ca [Vs 2.1.37] iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1553: nanu bhakter api karmatvānusāreṇa teṣu tad-vātsalyān na tal-lakṣaṇe tad iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1556: śrutiś ca sac-cid-ānandaika-rase bhakti-yoge tiṣṭhati [GTU 2.78] iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1557: na ca svarūpa-prayuktatvād dūṣaṇam etad iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c09u:1561: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananya-bhāk |
GE07bhg4c09u:1562: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c09u:1563: śrīdhara: api ca mad-bhakter evāyam avitarkyaṃ prabhāva iti darśayann āha
GE07bhg4c09u:1566: pṛthag-devatāpi vāsudeva eveti buddhyā devatāntara-bhaktim akurvan mām eva
GE07bhg4c09u:1567: parameśvaraṃ bhajate tarhi sādhuḥ śreṣṭha eva sa mantavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1571: madhusūdanaḥ -kiṃ ca mad-bhakter evāyaṃ mahimā yat same 'pi vaiṣamyam āpādayati śṛṇu tan-mahimānam api ced iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1572: yaḥ kaścit sudurācāro 'pi ced ajāmilādir ivānanya-bhāk san māṃ bhajate kutaścid bhāgyodayāt sevate sa prāg asādhur api sādhur eva mantavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1575: viśvanātha : sva-bhakteṣv āsaktir mama svābhāviky eva bhavati, sā durācāre 'pi bhakte nāpayāti
GE07bhg4c09u:1576: tam apy utkṛṣṭam eva karomīty āha api ced iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1577: sudurācāraḥ para-hiṃsā para-dāra-para-dravyādi-grahaṇa-parāyaṇe 'pi māṃ bhajate cet, kīdṛg-bhajanavān ity ata āha, ananya-bhāk matto
GE07bhg4c09u:1581: nanv etādṛśe kadācāre dṛṣṭe sati, kathaṃ sādhutvam ? tatrāha, mantavyo mananīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1586: nanu tvāṃ bhajate ity etad-aṃśena sādhuḥ para-dārādi-grahaṇāṃśenāsādhuś ca sa mantavyas tatrāha eveti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1588: kadāpi tasyāsādhutvaṃ na draṣṭavyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1590: dustyajena sva-pāpena narakaṃ tiryag-yonir vā yāmi aikāntikaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1591: śrī-kṛṣṇa-bhajanaṃ tu naiva jihāsāmīti sa śobhanam adhyavasāyaṃ kṛtavān ity arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c09u:1592: baladevaḥ - mama śuddha-bhakti-vaśyatā-lakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvo dustyaja eva |
GE07bhg4c09u:1593: yad ahaṃ jugupsita-karmaṇy api bhakte 'nurajyaṃs tam utkarṣayāmīti pūrvārthaṃ puṣṇann āha api ced iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1595: 'tivigarhita-karmāpi san māṃ bhajate mat-kīrtanādibhir māṃ sevate tad api sa sādhur eva mantavyaḥ
GE07bhg4c09u:1597: mad-ekāntī mām eva svāminaṃ parama-pumarthaṃ ca jānann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1598: ubhayathā vartamāno 'pi sādhutvena sa pūjya iti bodhayitum eva-kāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1599: tasya tathātve manane mantavya iti sva-nideśa-rūpo vidhiś ca darśitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1601: ubhayathāpi vartamānasya sādhutvam evety atroktaṃ hetuṃ puṣṇann āha samyag iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1611: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati ||31||
GE07bhg4c09u:1612: śrīdharaḥ - nanu kathaṃ samīcīnādhyavasāya-mātreṇa sādhur mantavyaḥ ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1619: naitātmanyerann iti śaṅkākulam arjunaṃ protsāhayati he kaunteya
GE07bhg4c09u:1620: paṭahādi-mahā-ghoṣa-pūrvakaṃ vivadamānānāṃ sabhāṃ gatvā bāhum utkṣipya niḥśaṅkaṃ pratijānīhi pratijñāṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c09u:1624: tataś ca te taṃ prauḍhi-vijṛmbha-vidhvaṃsita-kutarkāḥ santo niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvām eva gurutvenāśrayeran
GE07bhg4c09u:1625: madhusūdanaḥ - asmād eva samyag-vyavasāyāt sa hitvā durācāratāṃ kṣipram iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1626: cira-kālam adharmātmāpi mad-bhajana-mahimnā kṣipraṃ śīghram eva
GE07bhg4c09u:1627: bhavati dharmātmā dharmānugat-citto durācāratvaṃ jhaṭity eva tyaktvā
GE07bhg4c09u:1629: kiṃ ca śaśvan nityaṃ śāntiṃ viṣaya-bhogaspṛhā-nivṛttiṃ nigacchati nitarāṃ prāpnoty atinirvedāt
GE07bhg4c09u:1630: kaścit tvad-bhaktaḥ prāg abhyastaṃ durācāratvam atyajan na bhaved api dharmātmā |
GE07bhg4c09u:1631: tathā ca sa naśyed eveti nety āha bhaktānukampāparavaśatayā kupita iva bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c09u:1632: naitad āścaryaṃ manvīthā he kaunteya niścitam evedṛśaṃ mad-bhakter māhātmyam |
GE07bhg4c09u:1633: ato vipratipannānāṃ purastād api tvaṃ pratijānīhi sāvajñaṃ sa-garvaṃ ca pratijñāṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c09u:1634: na me vāsudevasya bhatko 'tidurācāro 'pi prāṇa-saṅkaṭam āpanno 'pi sudurlabham ayogyaḥ san
GE07bhg4c09u:1635: prārtahaymāno 'pi atimūḍho 'śaraṇo 'pi na praṇaśyati kiṃ tu kṛtārtha eva
GE07bhg4c09u:1638: śāstraṃ ca na vāsudeva-bhaktānām aśubhaṃ vidyate kvacit iti ||31||
GE07bhg4c09u:1639: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu tādṛśasyādharmiṇaḥ kathaṃ bhajanaṃ tvaṃ gṛhṇāsi ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1640: kāma-krodhādi-dūṣitāntaḥkaraṇena niveditam anna-pānādikaṃ katham aśnāsīty ata āha kṣipraṃ śīghram eva sa dharmātmā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c09u:1641: atra kṣipraṃ bhāvī sa dharmātmā śaśvac-chāntiṃ gamiṣyatīti aprayujya bhavati gacchatīti
GE07bhg4c09u:1642: vartamāna-prayogāt adharma-karaṇānantaram eva mām anusmṛtya kṛtānutāpaḥ kṣipram eva dharmātmā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c09u:1645: tad vidyām iti śaśvat punaḥ punar api śāntiṃ nirvedaṃ nitarāṃ gacchati |
GE07bhg4c09u:1646: yad vā kiyataḥ samayād anantaraṃ tasya bhāvi dharmātmatvaṃ tadānīm api sūkṣma-rūpeṇa vartata evaṃ tan manasi bhakteḥ preveśāt yathā pīte mahauṣadhi sati tadānīṃ kiya-kāla-paryantaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1647: naśyad-avastho jvara-dāho viṣa-dāho vā vartamāno 'pi na gaṇyata iti
GE07bhg4c09u:1649: tataś ca tasya bhaktasya durācāratva-gamakāḥ kāma-krodhādyā
GE07bhg4c09u:1650: utkhāta-daṃṣṭroraga-daṃśavad akiñcitkarā eva jñeyā iti anudhvaniḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1651: ataeva śaśvat sarvadaiva śāntiṃ kāma-krodhādy-upaśamaṃ nitarāṃ gacchaty atiśayena
GE07bhg4c09u:1652: prāpnotīti durācāratva-daśāyām api sa śuddhāntaḥkaraṇa eva ucyata iti
GE07bhg4c09u:1654: nanu yadi sa dharmātmā syāt tadā nāsti ko 'pi vivādaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1655: kintu kaścid durācāra-bhakto maraṇa-paryantam api durācāratvaṃ na jahāti, tasya kā vārtā ity ato bhakta-vatsalo bhagavān sa-prauḍhi sa-kopam ivāha kaunteyeti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1657: tad api prāṇa-nāśe adhaḥpātaṃ na yāti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1658_0: kutarka-karkaśa-vādino naitan manyerann iti śoka-śaṅkā-vyākulam arjunaṃ protsāhayati
GE07bhg4c09u:1658_1: he kaunteya paṭahakāhalādi-mahā-ghoṣa-pūrvakaṃ vivadamānānāṃ sabhāṃ gatvā bāhum utkṣipya
GE07bhg4c09u:1660: ? me mama parameśvarasya bhakto durācāro 'pi na praṇeśyety api tu kṛtārtha eva bhavati
GE07bhg4c09u:1662: santo niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvām eva gurutvenāśrayeran iti svāmi-caraṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1663: nanu kathaṃ bhagavān svayam apratijñāya pratijñātum arjunam evātidideśa |
GE07bhg4c09u:1664: yathaivāgre mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me iti vakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c09u:1665: tathaivātrāpi kaunteya pratijāne 'haṃ na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati iti kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1666: noktam ? ucyate - bhagavatā tadānīm eva vicāritaṃ bhakta-vatsalena mayā
GE07bhg4c09u:1669: yathā tatraiva bhīṣma-yuddhe sva-pratijñām apy apākṛtya bhīṣma-pratijñaiva
GE07bhg4c09u:1670: rakṣiṣyate, bahirmukhā vādino vaitaṇḍikā mat-pratijñāṃ śrutvā hasiṣyanti arjuna-pratijñā tu pāṣāṇa-rekhaiveti te pratiyanti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1677: sudurācāro 'pi māṃ bhajan śīghraṃ dharma-citto bhavati
GE07bhg4c09u:1678: | tataś ca śaśvac- chāntiṃ cittopaplavoparama-rūpāṃ parameśvara-niṣṭhāṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1680: kutarka-karkaśa-vādino naitātmanyerann iti śaṅkākulam arjunaṃ protsāhayati he kaunteya
GE07bhg4c09u:1681: vivadamānānāṃ sabhāṃ gatvā bāhum utkṣipya niḥśaṅkaṃ pratijānīhi pratijñāṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c09u:1682: katham ? me parameśvarasya bhaktaḥ sudurācāro 'pi na praṇaśyati |
GE07bhg4c09u:1685: prauḍhi-vijṛmbha-vidhvaṃsita-kutarkāḥ santo niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvām eva gurutvenāśrayeran ||31||
GE07bhg4c09u:1687: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1688: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim ||32||
GE07bhg4c09u:1689: śrīdharaḥ - svācāra-bhraṣṭaṃ mad-bhaktiḥ pavitrīkarotīti kim atra citram ?
GE07bhg4c09u:1690: yato mad-bhaktir duṣkulān apy anadhikāriṇo 'pi saṃsārān mocayatīty āha māṃ hīti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1696: te 'pi māṃ vyāpāśritya saṃsevya parāṃ gatiṃ yānti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1699: nistāram uktvā svābhāvika-doṣeṇa duṣṭānām api tam āha māṃ hīti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1700: hi niścitaṃ he pārtha māṃ vyapāścitya śaraṇam āgatya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpa-yonayo
GE07bhg4c09u:1705: 'dhyayanādy-abhāvena ca parama-gaty-ayogyās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim |
GE07bhg4c09u:1707: viśvanāthaḥ --- evaṃ karmaṇā durācārāṇām āgantukān doṣān mad-bhaktir na gaṇayati iti kiṃ citram ? yato jātyaiva durācārāṇāṃ svābhāvikān api doṣān
GE07bhg4c09u:1708: mad-bhaktir na gaṇayatīty āha mām iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1717: tepus tapas te juhuvuḥ sasnur āryā brahmānūcur nāma gṛṇanti ye te || [BhP 3.33.6-7]
GE07bhg4c09u:1719: baladevaḥ - mahā-ghoṣa-pūrvakaṃ vivadamānānāṃ sabhāṃ gatvā bāhum utkṣipya niḥśaṅkaṃ pratijānīhi pratijñāṃ kuru sarveśvaro 'haṃ mad-ekāntināṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1720: āgantuka-doṣān vidhunomīti kiṃ citram ? yad atipāpino 'pi
GE07bhg4c09u:1721: mad-bhakta-prasaṅgād vidhūtāvidyā vimucyanta ity āha māṃhīti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1724: māṃ sarveśaṃ vasudeva-sutaṃ vyapāśritya śaraṇam āgatya parāṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1725: yogi-durlabhāṃ gatiṃ mat-prāptiṃ yānti hi niścitam etat |
GE07bhg4c09u:1732: atrāsya lokasyānityatvaṃ kaṇṭhato bruvan harir mithyātvaṃ tasya nirāsāt ||32||
GE07bhg4c09u:1734: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā |
GE07bhg4c09u:1735: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām ||33||
GE07bhg4c09u:1736: śrīdharaḥ - yadaivaṃ tadā sat-kulāḥ sad-ācārāś ca mad-bhaktāḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yānti iti kiṃ vaktavyam ity āha kiṃ punar iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1738: | tathā rājānaś ca ta ṛṣayaś ca kṣatriyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1739: evaṃ bhūtāḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yāntīti kiṃ punar vaktavyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1743: sukha-rahitaṃ cemaṃ martya-lokaṃ prāpya anityatvād vilambam akurvan asukhatvāc ca sukhārtham udyamaṃ hitvā mām eva bhajasvety arthaḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c09u:1744: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ cet puṇyāḥ sadācārā uttama-yonayaś ca brāhmaṇās tathā
GE07bhg4c09u:1745: rājarṣayaḥ sūkṣma-vastu-vivekinaḥ kṣatriyā mama bhaktāḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yāntīti kiṃ punar vācyam atra kasyacid api sandehābhāvād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1747: mad-bhakter īdṛśo mahimāto mahatā pratnenemaṃ lokaṃ sarva-puruṣārtha-sādhana-yogyam atidurlabhaṃ ca mauṣya-deham anityam
GE07bhg4c09u:1748: āśu-vināśinam asukhaṃ garbha-vāsādy-aneka-duḥkha-bahulaṃ labdhvā yāvad ayaṃ na naśyati tāvad atiśīghram eva bhajasva māṃ śaraṇam āśrayasva |
GE07bhg4c09u:1749: anityatvād aukhatvāc cāsya vilambaṃ sukhārtham udyamaṃ ca mā kārṣīs tvaṃ ca rājarṣir ato mad-bhajanenātmānaṃ saphalaṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c09u:1750: anyathā hy etādṛśaṃ janma niṣphalam eva te syād ity arthaḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c09u:1751: viśvanāthaḥ --- tato 'pi kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyāḥ sat-kulāḥ sadācārāś ca ye bhaktāḥ |
GE07bhg4c09u:1754: yady evaṃ tarhi brāhmaṇā rājarṣayaḥ kṣatriyāś ca
GE07bhg4c09u:1755: sat-kulāḥ puṇyāḥ sad-ācāriṇo bhaktāḥ santaḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yāntīti kiṃ punar vācyam ? nāsty atra saṃśaya-leśo 'pi |
GE07bhg4c09u:1756: tasmāt tvam api rājarṣir imaṃ lokaṃ prāpya māṃ bhajasva anityaṃ naśvaram asukham īṣat sukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c09u:1757: alpa-sukhe 'smin loke rājya-spṛhāṃ vihāya nityam anantānandaṃ mām upāsya prāpnuhīti tvarātra vyajyate |
GE07bhg4c09u:1758: atrāsya lokasyānityatvaṃ kaṇṭhato bruvan harir mithyātvaṃ tasya nirāsāt ||33||
GE07bhg4c09u:1760: man-manā bhava mad-bhakto mad-yājī māṃ namaskuru |
GE07bhg4c09u:1762: śrīdharaḥ - bhajana-prakāraṃ daśrayann upasaṃharati man-manā iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1763: mayy eva mano yasya sa man-manāḥ tādṛśas tvaṃ bhava |
GE07bhg4c09u:1767: evam ebhiḥ prakārair mat-parāyaṇaḥ sann ātmānaṃ mano mayi yuktvā samādhāya
GE07bhg4c09u:1773: madhusūdanaḥ - bhajana-prakāraṃ darśayann upasaṃharati man-manā bhaveti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1774: rāja-bhaktasyāpi rāja-bhṛtyasya putrādau manas tathā sa tan-manā api na tad-bhakta ity ata uktaṃ man-manā bhava mad-bhakta iti |
GE07bhg4c09u:1778: mat-parāyaṇo mad-eka-śaraṇaḥ sann ātmānam antaḥkaraṇaṃ yuktvā mayi samādhāya mām eva paramānanda-ghanaṃ sva-prakāśaṃ sarvopadrava-śūnyam
